Uses of Package
zmq

  • Packages that use zmq 
    Package Description
    org.zeromq
    Provides high-level bindings for ØMQ.
    zmq
    Provides low-level bindings for ØMQ.
    zmq.io  
    zmq.io.coder  
    zmq.io.coder.raw  
    zmq.io.coder.v2  
    zmq.io.mechanism  
    zmq.io.mechanism.curve

    zmq.io.mechanism.plain  
    zmq.io.net  
    zmq.io.net.ipc  
    zmq.io.net.norm  
    zmq.io.net.pgm  
    zmq.io.net.tcp  
    zmq.io.net.tipc  
    zmq.msg
    Provides utility for message allocation within ØMQ.
    zmq.pipe  
    zmq.poll  
    zmq.socket  
    zmq.socket.clientserver  
    zmq.socket.pipeline  
    zmq.socket.pubsub  
    zmq.socket.radiodish  
    zmq.socket.reqrep  
    zmq.socket.scattergather  
    zmq.util  
  • Classes in zmq used by org.zeromq 
    Class Description
    Ctx
    Context object encapsulates all the global state associated with the library.
    It creates a reaper thread and some IO threads as defined by ZMQ.ZMQ_IO_THREADS.
    Msg  
    SocketBase  
    ZMQ.Event  
    ZMQ.EventConsummer
    An interface used to consume events in monitor
